title: Configure package metadata for PyPI
description: Update pyproject.toml with all required PyPI fields: description, long description, keywords, classifiers, urls, author info, license

title: Create scripts/ directory structure for test scripts
Build and test distribution packages
description: Set up poetry build, create source and wheel distributions, test installation from local wheel

title: Add Snyk scanning to GitHub Actions CI
description:
Integrate Snyk vulnerability scanning into .github/workflows/ci.yml as a gating check

- Add Snyk authentication step
- Run snyk test on dependencies
- Fail build on high/critical vulnerabilities
- Upload Snyk report as artifact
- Configure severity thresholds
- Document Snyk setup for contributors

title: Move demo_*.py and simulate_*.py files to scripts/demos/
Create SnykAgent class
description: Inherit from BaseAgent, implement handle() method, call snyk CLI and return vulnerability findings

title: Document Snyk setup and integration
description: Add to README: installation, API token setup, severity filtering, scan results examples

title: Publish DevLoop to PyPI
description:
Make DevLoop installable via pip install devloop for easier distribution

- Configure package metadata in pyproject.toml
- Set up build configuration (build tool)
- Create PyPI account and API token
- Build distribution packages
- Publish to PyPI test repository (validation)
- Publish to production PyPI
- Update installation documentation
- Add release workflow to GitHub Actions

title: Implement Multi-CI Platform Support (v0.3.0)
description: Support GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, CircleCI, and other CI platforms beyond GitHub Actions with pluggable adapter interface

title: Add Code Rabbit configuration to agents.json
description: Define triggers (file:save, git:pre-commit), API key env var, min severity setting

title: Integrate Snyk CLI as Agent
description:
Add Snyk as a devloop agent for security vulnerability scanning

- Create SnykAgent wrapper class
- Implement CLI integration (snyk command)
- Configure agent in .devloop/agents.json
- Add findings to context store with severity levels
- Document setup and API token configuration
- Test with vulnerable dependencies

title: Add release automation to GitHub Actions
description: Create release workflow: detect version tag, build wheel/sdist, auto-publish to PyPI on version tag push

title: Document Code Rabbit setup and integration
description: Add to README: installation, API key setup, configuration options, example output

title: Create CodeRabbitAgent class
description: Inherit from BaseAgent, implement handle() method, call code-rabbit CLI and return findings

title: Publish to PyPI test repository
description: Create PyPI account and test token, publish to testpypi.python.org, verify package, install from test PyPI to validate

title: Integrate Code Rabbit CLI as Agent
description:
Add Code Rabbit as a devloop agent for code analysis and insights

- Create CodeRabbitAgent wrapper class
- Implement CLI integration (code-rabbit command)
- Configure agent in .devloop/agents.json
- Add findings to context store
- Document setup and API key configuration
- Test with sample files

title: PyPI tokens need to be configured in CI/deployment environment
Add Snyk configuration to agents.json
description: Define triggers (file:save, git:pre-commit), API token env var, severity level filtering

title: Agent Marketplace (v0.5.0)
description: Build system for sharing custom agents with community - discovery, installation, ratings

title: Test Code Rabbit agent end-to-end
description: Create test file with known issues, run CodeRabbitAgent, verify findings appear in context store and summary

title: Update installation documentation for PyPI
description: Update README with pip install devloop, add version badge, update quick start to use pip instead of git clone

title: Move phase completion docs to docs/completed/
Test Snyk agent end-to-end
description: Create vulnerable test file, run SnykAgent, verify security findings appear in context store with correct severity

title: Publish to production PyPI
description: Create production PyPI account/token, publish devloop package, verify on https://pypi.org/project/devloop/

title: IDE Integration: VSCode Extension (v0.4.0)
description: Build VSCode extension for real-time agent feedback in editor with inline quick fixes
